description: This class serves as the entry point for the Todo backend application built with Spring Boot. It sets up the application configuration and API documentation metadata using OpenAPI annotations.

classes.name: TodoBackendApplication
classes.description: Main application class annotated with @SpringBootApplication and OpenAPIDefinition, responsible for bootstrapping the Spring Boot application and providing API documentation metadata.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that launches the Spring Boot application using SpringApplication.run.
